Text: Are you sure you want to reassign colors to all beavers and bots according to the current settings?
Some beavers with special names will have specific colors. Editable file located at: Documents\Timberborn\ColorfulBeavers\ColorNames.txt
Assign a random color to each beaver. Editable color list at: Documents\Timberborn\ColorfulBeavers\RandomColors.txt
Apply random color to the bots as well.
